JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities Required Skillset:TechnicalSkills –Software development, Installation and configurations, Debug and Troubleshooting.Programming knowledge –PHP, Java, Angular Js, CSS, HTML, MySQL,SQL server or sound knowledge in any programming language, Database Scripting SQL.Role Summary:The developer will work along with the business users within the company to support, manage and implement new features in Lab’s.The ideal candidate for this position will have experience excelling in a fast-paced, deadline driven environment and love closely working with the real users.His/her responsibilities include develop, maintain and support any IT related issues / development in Lab’s for smooth running of the company businesses and other supporting functions for the identified processes.Documenting and training the business users will be part of the job.You must be able to work with technical and non-technical teams and with customers of diverse academic, cultural, and professional backgrounds.He/she should work well in a highly collaborative team and able to focus independently with minimal supervision.Should possess good communication skills - both written and verbal.
